name: Daddy May Cry
description:
Your father is sleeping ... now is your time to attack.. I MEAN spend a prank to him.

You have to be quick but careful, you can wake him up earlier than you have planned.

Controls are WASD to move, Space to pick items, Shift to run and Escape to come back to the menu.

Alt + F4 to close...

Credits

Game made by TheAlanal, Firred and Berklan.

Sound effects from freesounds.org

Open font PixelFJVerdana

Music made with Bosca Ceoil

Art made with Piskel
